item.description:
Summer's not over.....at least I won't allow it!

We'll take the 9am Ferry to Block Island, RI. Saturday morning leaving from Point Judith.

Here's the ferry's schedule ... http://www.blockislan...

It's $26.15 for the ferry round trip including bike.

We'll stay at the following in......http://www.lighthouse... Saturday Night.

It's $50 per person plus tax for the hotel room if you have a roommate.

Sunday we'll bike in Newport.

Good food, a night out, and great friends to wrap up the summer!

Hold your spot now...

Let me know if you have a suggestion!

Biking is of course the main feature/event but we'll do some beach action if weather cooperates!

Rob Fox
Founder/Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: My cell on the day of the ride is 617-894-8454
item.name: Block Island Trip
